comment: I would definitely take this class again. Who wouldn't want a math professor who lets you use a full sheet of paper front and back as a "cheat sheet" for the final? (Plus, the final is multiple choice.) The test are easy as long as you understand the material. I'm bad at math and I got an A, you'll do fine too.

Does not take attendance. Come whenever you want. Puts all the power points online. Never went to class and made a great grade. Her tests are EXACTLY like the study guides just different numbers. Lets you have cheat sheets with formulas. She's honestly great you have to take her!!!! (:
This class was so easy. If you hate math and plan to skip class TAKE HER. She is really chill and wants you to succeed.

She was a great teacher but the way she describes certain things is confusing if you have learned it one way before. I'm horrible at math and her tests are okay, there's nothing too hard about them but they notes are critical to pay attention to. 1101 is basically just remembering formulas but I still struggled to understand.

Ashley is so chill, easily one of my favorite professors. The class isn't hard at all. All you really have to do is study and you will most likely get an A. I am really bad at math but she made it very understandable. Class isn't mandatory so it is very flexible. I would take her again.

Professor Williams class is very easy to pass. Attendance is not mandatory and you can do well if you skip (all A's on the tests). If you show your work on tests you will receive almost all credit even if you get the answer wrong. Study guides are exactly what's on the tests. It's impossible not to do well in this class. Take her for an easy A!
Great professor. Everything in class is throughly explained and taught. She is always willing to help. No quizzes, just tests but the study guides are really helpful. Awesome class! Would take again!

Professor Williams is great! If you take her for summer semester, be prepared to move quickly. She is always willing to help her students when they ask. There are four tests and be sure to do the online homework; it will benefit you in the end. She also gives extra credit. Review the material frequently and you will get an A!

Overall Mrs. Williams was a great professor. She was very straight forward as well as helpful if you need help. Attendance wasn't mandatory but I would recommend going to class. The class was pretty easy and we hardly ever stayed in class the entire hour and 15 minutes.

Mrs. Williams is a decent professor. Attendance isn't mandatory, but it really helps to be in class for her lectures. Sometimes the way she explains things can be confusing/boring. But she will always clarify if asked. Homework is all online and is really easy. She's super nice and approachable. Easy A.

She was a pretty good professor if you like and are good at math. I did very well in the class, but only because I could follow her teaching style. If you tend to get lost easy, good luck. She didn't seem very approachable. All the homework is online and the tests are pretty easy. Attendance isn't mandatory

Math is not an easy subject for me and I took this teacher BC I heard she was easy to take. Not the case at all. She makes you learn everything pretty much on your own, if you dare ask a question..she acts as if you are pulling her hair out,and she never replies to emails. Also tends to cancel class a lot. Ive never been so lost..Big waste of money

This class was fairly easy. I didn't really use the textbook much. All assignments are due off of webassign and their are reviews and study guides before the tests. If you go to class every so often and do the homework then you can easily make an A in the class. She is very lenient and willing to help. It's a laid-back class. You also get out early
